description.@value: A popular and quick chicken dish for the family

recipeInstructions.@value: Heat a little oil in the pan and fry the chicken both sides until golden. Transfer to a baking dish and pour over the sauce. Cook for 30 mins or until chicken is cooked through. Scatter over the rest of the basil.
Serve with a short pasta, like fusilli , or a big bowl potatoes roasted with olive oil and rosemary.
Take off heat and stir in the mascarpone and half the basil.
Fry onions, garlic in 3 tbsp oil until softened. Add tomatoes, season, then simmer for 10-15 mins until thick and glossy.
